title: Game wont load.
body:
I got through champion selection and everything fine, but the load screen doesn't pop up. I've tried reconnecting but nothing happens. It's saying game is still in progress and then just popping up as the reconnect screen again. I've played on this patch a day or two ago and nothing changed since then; to my knowledge at least.

I also just did a full repair scan and I got a bug splat... Should I reinstall?

replies.body:
If you're getting a bugsplat now after trying to run that repair, we may need to take a closer look at some of your game files as well as troubleshooting why you haven't been able to load into game recently. For those bugsplats, let's grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with a **force repatch** first to make sure the patch installed correctly. 

As for why you couldn't get loaded into those matches, I want to go ahead and check up on some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to be sure everything is configured in the best way for League. Run through that network guide paying close attention port forwarding and flushing your DNS and be sure to test these changes in a custom game first. Let me know how all of that goes!
